Title: Relates to establishing a tax credit for essential retail employees during the novel coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak
Summary: Relates to establishing a tax credit for essential retail employees during the novel coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak for tax owed between February 15, 2020 to June 15, 2020; such period of time can be extended for up to three years by the commissioner.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to establishing a tax credit for essential retail employees during the novel coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak
